articles.author: Allison Chinchar, CNN Meteorologist
articles.title: Millions of Americans will be forced into an involuntary polar plunge this week - CNN
articles.description: After a mild end to the weekend for many states, Old Man Winter will make a comeback as we start off the new workweek.
articles.content:

articles.title: The group that brought down Keystone XL faces agonies of its own - POLITICO
articles.description: It was the upstart that changed the face of America’s environmental movement. But 350.org, founded by the legendary Bill McKibben, has been laid low by a budget crunch, equity fights and union strife.
articles.content:
A June 2020 report by a consultant hired by the organization after the layoffs illuminated those feelings.
Confidence and trust in the leadership of the organisation - both senior staff and board - … [+9032 chars]

articles.title: Plant Fossils Found in San Juan Islands Like 'Finding a Penguin in North America' - Centralia Chronicle
